meanings.definition: The act of paginating a document.
meanings.sent1: The paginations of the report were done meticulously to ensure clarity.
meanings.sent2: I need to complete the paginations of this manual before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The paginations of the novel were so perfectly organized that even the characters were impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in the paginations of the manuscript was like a symphony conductor directing each note.
meanings.sent5: The paginations of the brochure made it easy to navigate and find information quickly.

meanings.definition: The total number of pages in a document.
meanings.sent1: The paginations of the book were more than I expected.
meanings.sent2: I lost track of the paginations in the massive report.
meanings.sent3: The paginations of the magazine seemed to grow every time I turned a page.
meanings.sent4: The paginations of the thesis reached a record high, surprising even the author.
meanings.sent5: The paginations of the atlas seemed endless, each page revealing a new world.
